System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 750MHz or better
Video Card RAM: 32MB, 3D hardware acceleration required
DirectX Version: 9.0c or above
RAM: 256 MB for XP, 512 MB for Vista
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Westward III - Gold Rush_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

When gold is discovered in the Northern California wilderness, three adventurous pioneers set out to stake their claim. Help them build and defend their growing settlement against dangerous bandits, conniving cheats and disaster in Westwardr III: Gold Rush. Explore uncharted terrain rich in natural resources, where gold is abundant and treachery hides behind every handshake, and gather the supplies needed to build your dusty tent settlement into a thriving boomtown. Customize your town with over 50 buildings, luxuries and upgrades, and hire lawmen and gunslingers to keep the peace. Control the fortune of an entire settlement in Westwardr III: Gold Rush!
